alert.note: Alert for Greer; Harmon; Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:47AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts will impact portions of western Jackson, Harmon, Greer, northwestern Foard and northwestern Hardeman Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 244 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Vinson to 9 miles southwest of Hollis to near Cee Vee. Movement was east-southeast at 40 mph. The gusty winds will precede any storms by at least 15 minutes. While many locations will see the gusty winds, the rain from thunderstorms will be more spotty. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mangum, Quanah, Hollis, Granite, Eldorado, Gould, Vinson, Duke, Goodlett, Madge, Hester, McQueen, Lazare, and McKnight. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Severe weather is not expected and no warnings are anticipated at this time.
